messages.subject: samurai/ninja poisons
messages.msgSnippet: Nothing in my (admittedly meager) library of reference books mentions any particular poisons. However, the blow-fish poison is a good guess as well as possibly
messages.messageBody:
Nothing in my (admittedly meager) library of reference books mentions any particular poisons. However, the blow-fish poison is a good guess as well as possibly scorpion (and other insect) and serpent poisons. I'm not sure a samurai would use poison (the honor thing?), but with all the supposed "court intrigue", you never know. Of course, all this is just my two cents worth.
